content: row is shown in a different colour to help make it easier to read the black dark green and light green symbols depict yarn colour a while the red and orange symbols depict yarn colour b 2 diagram shows only 4 shell repeats but this diagram works for any number of repeats hold this stitch hold 2 this stitch 1 hold this stitch f1 f2 starting tail starting slip_stitch double_crochet single_crochet chain x row number tail like and follow us on facebook visit our blog check us out at ravelry follow us on pintrest page numb www facebook com/its2kuteamigurumi www its2kute com www ravelry com/stores/kevin-price-designs www pinterest com/its2kute 4
